Article.ArticleTitle: A simple and rapid simultaneous measurement strategy for optical rotatory dispersion and circular dichroism.

Abstract.AbstractText: A simple cavity-based technology capable of simultaneously measuring optical rotary dispersion and circular dichroism within milliseconds offers ultra-high sensitivity and unprecedented spectral resolution. This advancement holds significant potential for various biochemical applications, including drug development, clinical diagnosis, and food science and safety.
